name: Stronghold HD
description: Stronghold is a historic real-time strategy game developed by Firefly Studios in 2001. The game focuses primarily on conquest and expansion through military pursuits, but also provides space for economic strategy and development. Because of its popularity, the game spawned five sequels: Stronghold: Crusader, Stronghold 2, Stronghold Legends, Stronghold 3 and Stronghold Crusader II.
